verbs.description: [ARGM-PRP: why] [V: spot] [ARG1: the ball] [ARGM-LOC: on the hash marks] instead of the direct middle of the field have a question about the nfl ask times nfl writer sam farmer and he will answer as many as he can online and in the sunday editions of the newspaper throughout the season email questions to sam farmer latimes com charles h moore glendale arizona tv nfl matt shupper la cañada flintridge sam farmer mike carey american football
